channel.title: The Great Soul Train Robbery
channel.description:
CONTENT WARNING: Violence, demons, pain, loss, regret.
DESCRIPTION: On the road to Hell there was a railway line. An express train to the infernal city of Dis, crewed by Furies and carrying treasure and souls to damnation. You’re going to rob it. You’re a motley crew of Desperados with mixed motives. Will you claim your prize from the train? Or will you be overcome, damned, or broken by the heist?
SPECIAL REQUEST: Please wait to sign up for the first 24 hours unless you are a member of a marginalized community. RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: PST 04/30/2021 19:00
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: 1 NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 4 SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: X-Card, Lines and Veils, Open Table, Gauntlet Code of Conduct.
SET UP INFO: Streamyard BREAKS: 2 x 10 mins on hour. RECORDED: With permission granted before and after each session. PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
SESSION LINK: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MZQlMlfVP9fPVFmdjWE
